sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.SlowPatternGraphManager</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>SlowPatternGraphManager</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var SlowPatternGraphManager = Class.create();
SlowPatternGraphManager.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	getGraphSysId: function() {
		var tableName = this.getParameter('sysparm_table');
		var patternSysId = this.getParameter('sysparm_pattern_id');
		var timeSpan = this.getParameter('sysparm_time_span');
		var graphType = this.getParameter('sysparm_graph_type');
		
		var gr = new GlideRecord("jrobin_definition");
		gr.addQuery('base_shard', tableName);
		gr.addQuery('name', 'CONTAINS', graphType);
		gr.query();

		while (gr.next()) { 
			var gr2 = new GlideRecord("jrobin_graph_line");
			gr2.addQuery('jrobin_definition', gr.getValue('sys_id'));
			gr2.addQuery('jrobin_graph.form', true);
			gr2.query();

			while (gr2.next()) {
				return gr2.jrobin_graph;
			}
		}
		
		return null;
	},
    type: 'SlowPatternGraphManager'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2017-04-06 23:02:04</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>4f4726d0670232005423ebc172415af3</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>26</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>SlowPatternGraphManager</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Performance Dashboards" source="com.glide.performance_dashboards">3b01cdcb6d2620100acb70b353433071</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_4f4726d0670232005423ebc172415af3</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2017-04-07 00:37:24</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>861</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
